name: Buddyfight SIM 0.1 Unofficial Nag Fix Mod
description: This is a mod to fix few things that troubles me while using the sim.  The most important fix might be disabling Wikia hyperlinks, which made me prematurely quit battle several times.  Enjoy!
additional_info:
### Features ###
* disable all wikia links in card info UI to avoid misclick in game
* Removes several unnecessary ui portion for old users
　　* Bushiroad disclaimer
　　* Browser compatibility hint
　　* Page margins

### Credits ###
* I would like to thank Otakon7 for making this awesome sim!
